resources.string: Made with love by the IIP Team

Privacy is one of the important aspect of an individual. In today's world, rapid advancements in technology have also lead to lot of discrepancy of data and its misuse has become quite frequent nowadays.
We pledge to prevent the misuse of you data in any form, your data is in safe hands.
I thereby declare that all the data inputted by me in the app is true to my ability, I would be responsible for the actions that I pertake after results, Wellness Meter team would not held guilty under any law.
I also declare that :

**Note : The Health Index percentage generated is totally based upon the data entered by the user . Users are adviced not to take it as the final verdict of their health\'s status, consulting professionals is always recommended.
Already have an account? Sign In
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

The App provides a wellness score calculation based on various health-related parameters and data input by the user.
 The wellness score is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional medical advice.

 The Wellness Score will be based on following parameters:

 1. Body Mass Index(BMI):
 (a) less than 18.5 then score = 7.0
 (b) within 18.50 and 25 then score = 10
 (c) within 25 and 30 then score = 7
 (d) within 30 and 40 then score = 5
 (e) more than 40 then score = 4


2. Pulse Rate:
 (a) Within 60 and 100 then score = 10.0
 (b) less than 60 then score = normalised
 (c) more than 100 then score = normalised


3. Sugar Level:
 (a) Within 70 and 100 then score = 10.0
 (b) less than 70 then score = 5.0
 (c) within 100 and 125 then score = 8.0


4. Cholesterol level
 (a) age less than or equal to 19 and level less than 170 then score = 10.0
 (b) age less than or equal to 19 and level > 170 then score = normalised
 (c) age > 19 and level within 125 and 200 then score = 10.0
 (d) age > 19 and level less than 125 then score = normalised
 (e) age > 19 and level more than 200 then score = normalised
